item.title: Tree longest path by dfs 2x
item.description: Definition of a tree (Taken from Wikipedia) A tree is an undirected graph \(G\) that satisfies any of the following equivalent conditions: \(G\) is connected and acyclic (contains no cycles). \(G\) is acyclic, and a simple cycle is formed if any edge is added to \(G\). \(G\) is connected, but would become disconnected if any single edge is removed from \(G\). \(G\) is connected and the 3-vertex complete graph \(K_3\) is not a minor of \(G\).
